properties.areaDesc: Waters from San Mateo point to the Mexican Border Extending 30 to 60 nm out including San Clemente Island; Coastal Waters from San Mateo Point to the Mexican Border and out to 30 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 12:05PM PST until February 4 at 12:00PM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts to 30 kt through
this afternoon, becoming northeast 15 to 20 kt with gusts to 30
kt this evening. Combined seas 8 to 12 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from San Mateo Point to the Mexican
Border and out to 30 nm and Waters from San Mateo point to the
Mexican Border Extending 30 to 60 nm out including San Clemente
Island. Strongest winds this afternoon will be near San Clemente
Island and this evening through early Tuesday will be mostly
between San Clemente Island and the northern San Diego County
coast.

* WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON PST TODAY
